components.content:
If successful for grant funding, as part of the programme, you declare that your organisation is willing to:

  • participate in an evaluation of the project’s impact and be able to reliably capture the relevant data as set out in the prospectus
  • monitor and record instances of anti-Muslim hate that is consistent with any definitions adopted for this term, should the government choose to adopt a definition in future
  • share anonymised data with the Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government (MHCLG), the police and other public sector bodies, as required

name: Apply for funding to monitor and report anti-Muslim hate to better support victims
